    • Electronic - Modified Epoxy Resin

    The Evolution of Technology

    The Fine Polymers Group is an "R&D-oriented company" belong to KISCO group and it develops and provides technologies and products that meet the needs of our customers, with a focus on resin products for electronic components and semiconductor chemicals. Our mission is to contribute widely to society by providing our independently developed products and technologies for a variety of applications through our customers.

    Epoxy resin compound products

    Trademarks EpiFine™
    Main Products Sealing of small electronic components, adhesives (1 component), sealants for light emitting diodes (LEDs) (2 components), casting of electronic components, sealants, adhesives (2 components), and resin formulation products (epoxy resin heating, melting and mixing)

    Polymer remover for water-based semiconductors

    Trademarks EcoPeeler™
    Main Products for Al wiring processesCu wiring processesTransistor forming processesLow-k materialsSurface processing, protection, and cleaning of metal thin-film products

    Contributing to the development of customers' products

    Research and development

    The Fine Polymers Group develops products that support advanced electronics, including epoxy resins in the electrical and electronics fields, as well as chemicals used in the semiconductor field.
    Our mission is to listen to the voices of our customers and develop products that meet their needs, and we will strive to propose technologies and products that are more effective for our customers based on our accumulated know-how and the latest knowledge.

    Production & Quality

    Company-wide Manufacturing: In order to reflect customer needs in our products and create better products, the technology, production, and quality assurance departments share information and conduct integrated production activities.
    Strict Quality Control: We manage the products we produce every day based on management standards and systems based on ISO9001 certification, and feed back the information to the production site to create products of higher quality.
    Thorough Trend Management: We manage the data of each of our various products and strive to create optimal products that meet the needs of our customers.
